{
  story(id: "{{ .story_id }}"){
    id
    name
    owner{
      group
      teamkatalogenURL
    }
    keywords
    views{
      ... on StoryViewHeader{
        content
        level
      }
      ... on StoryViewMarkdown{
        content
      }
    }
  }
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.story.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "story": {
      "name": "mystory",
      "owner": {
        "group": "nada@nav.no",
        "teamkatalogenURL": "https://some.url"
      },
      "keywords": [
        "key1",
        "key2"
      ],
      "views": [
        {
          "content": "Header",
          "level": 1
        },
        {
          "content": "Markdown description"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
